summary:
I appreciate your time to look into my profile. This is Jerin, a mom, business women, animal lover, apparel professional & business enthusiast. 

I am passionate about fashion and empowering people to push beyond their perceived limitations. I am beyond grateful for the business I have been able to build and the support given to me by so many. 

Life is more than building a business. We network for many reasons and while it is extremely important for business relationships it can also lead to relationships that become friendships with a goal of creating great positive impact.

I am on a mission to empower as many people as I can to lead a fulfilled life and realize their dreams. I have learned a lot on my personal journey and want to use my experiences to empower those that I can. It does not matter where you come from. What matters is where you want to go. 

Empowering others and seeing them smile because they have achieved something they didn’t think possible is what drives me. 

Together, we can serve, support and make a global impact for communities everywhere.

Just to give you a little glimpse of how I can help you:

-	Helping global investors / businessmen find potential companies / industries in Bangladesh
-	Setting up your business in Bangladesh if you want to expand / start any business in my country
-	Helping local businesses go beyond the borders through my large network globally
-	Helping global brands source ready made garments products from Bangladesh for over 20 years 
-	Helping people build their personal brand on LinkedIn 
-	Helping companies with LinkedIn marketing strategy 


Thank you again for visiting my profile. If you there is anyway you think we can collaborate, I would be more than happy to be in touch . 

Pls shoot me a mail at jerin.hossain@gmail.com

miniProfile.occupation: 1+ Million followers on linkedin | Global influencer | Online-Entrepreneur |Apparel | Digital transformer| Business Owner | I help the Businesses & Products go BIG 🌍
